alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 11:31PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson and Lewis Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of West Carthage, or 15 miles southeast of Fort Drum, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Drum, Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Herrings, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Copenhagen, Harrisville, Croghan, Castorland, Deferiet, East Rodman, Bellwood, Rector and Rutland Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
